segments.text: I can't help but smile at the little conspirators.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is incredibly determined to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched so far, reaching deep into the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly unstable, though; it's practically dancing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm impressed by his climbing skills, even if they are ill-advised.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl, with her hand held out, she's the perfect accomplice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on their sweet prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely engrossed in her dish-drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She hasn't the slightest idea what's happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic scene of childhood mischief unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get caught, or worse, fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their expressions are priceless, full of anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR
